pkgmetadata.longdescription: Faust (Functional Audio Stream) is a functional programming language for sound synthesis and audio processing with a strong focus on the design of synthesizers, musical instruments, audio effects, etc. created at the GRAME-CNCM Research Department.

use.flag: Builds the Faust compiler with LLVM backend and every static libraries
Builds the Faust compiler (without the LLVM backend) and includes all the static and dynamic libraries
